name: Bust A Groove
description: Boogie to a different beat with Bust A Groove--the most realistic dance game ever created for the funked-up PlayStation generation! Compete in a dance-off against a friend or break out a fresh solo number with one of 10 motion-captured professional dancers. Combo and attack moves show your style as you kick a funky rhythm in one of four groovin' dance modes. Join the party and get your body movin' to the original tunes and gameplay of Bust A Groove!
